scripts.test: npx newman run "./tests/dapr-microservices.postman_collection.json" -e "./tests/dapr-microservice (debug local).postman_environment.json" -r htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-title "microservices integration"
scripts.test-dashboard: npx newman run "./tests/dapr-microservices.postman_collection.json" -e "./tests/dapr-microservice (debug local).postman_environment.json" -r htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export ../../docs/tests/newman/dashboard.html --reporter-htmlextra-title "microservices integration"
